entries.journal_entry_description: The Rryatt Trail Master is sending you to seek out his Trail Guides and learn their shortcuts and secrets about moving quickly in the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with the Trail Guides at the end of each area to learn shortcuts for quick travel around the Rryatt.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Learn the path to delve deeper into the Worshyr Forest
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Learn the secrets to reach the Worshyr Canopy
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Learn the secret to reach the Webweaver Path.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Learn the secret path leading down to The Shadowed Lands
